title: Apple unveils iPhone 16: AI, new chips and other key features
description: Apple's ubiquitous iPhone is about to break new ground with a shift into artificial intelligence that will do everything from smartening up its frequently dim-witted assistant Siri to creating customized emojis on the fly. Here are all the key features of the latest iPhone series.
content: Apple on Monday jumped onto the AI bandwagon with a new iPhone lineup. The move marks the company’s latest effort to take advantage of popular technology and turn it into a cultural phenomenon."The next generation of iPhone has been designed for Apple Intelligence from the ground up. It marks the beginning of an exciting new era," chief executive Tim Cook said at the product launch.Apple unveiled its new iPhone lineup with four models: the iPhone 16, iPhone 16 Plus, iPhone 16 Pro, and iPhone 16 Pro Max.All four models will be equipped with advanced chips designed to support a range of AI tools. Apple aims to make these new features enhance the iPhone's appeal and address a recent decline in sales.Its upgraded camera system includes a 48MP Fusion camera with a 2x Telephoto option, offering two cameras in one, and a new ultra-wide camera for macro photography. The updated AI capabilities are intended to make Siri smarter and more versatile. The iPhone 16 Pro and Pro Max models will have Apple’s largest displays ever, measuring up to 6.3 inches for the Pro and 6.9 inches for the Pro Max.Most of the new AI functions will be included in a free update to iOS 18, which will be available when the iPhone 16 launches in December. Initially, the update will feature English, with additional languages to be added next year.
